text: Indian equity benchmarks rose in early trade, led by Reliance Industries Ltd. after the telecom regulator lowered the interconnect usage charges, which is likely to benefit new entrant Reliance Jio Infocomm Ltd.The S&P BSE Sensex Index climbed as much as 0.3 percent to 32,499 and NSE Nifty 50 Index rose as much as 0.2 percent to 10,171.Fourteen of the 19 sector gauges compiled by the BSE Ltd. gained, led by the S&P BSE Capital Goods Index’s 1.11 percent jump. The market breadth was tilted in favour of buyers. Around 1000 stocks advanced, while 500 stocks declined on the NSE.
title: Stocks Radar: Reliance Industries, Kamat Hotels, Shreyas Shipping
